description.message: Adds infinite scroll, favicons, server locations, "View image" button, "Download image" button and more to Google search.

jump_to_related_searches_btn_is_visible_.message: Show jump to related searches/pagination buttons

page_indicator_is_visible_label_text.message: Show total number of loaded pages/current page indicator

img_viewer_img_action_bar_is_visible_lab.message: Show image action buttons in image viewer

preview_img_viewer_img_action_bar_is_vis.message: Show image action buttons in image previews (works only for the first 100 images)

img_viewer_img_action_bar_is_visible_onl.message: Show only when hovering over image

scroll_to_top_title.message:
Left-click to go to top. (Tab: Enter)

Right-click to go to bottom. (Tab: Ctrl + Enter)

When you go to top or bottom Search Enhancer for Google™ remembers your position. To return to this position middle-click. (Tab: Shift + Enter)

You can also remember your position without going to top or bottom. To do this, middle-click, if Search Enhancer for Google™ doesn't have a position remembered, or click and hold middle button for 0.35 second if it does. (Tab: Alt + Enter)

enable_infinite_scrolling_help_text.message: Google now has a native infinite scroll feature in the "All" section, but if you scroll long enough, it stops loading new pages, showing a "More results" button instead. If you enable this option, Search Enhancer for Google™ will click on this button automatically as you scroll. This option also adds infinite scroll to the non-"All" sections.

page_separators_is_visible_help_text.message: Separators won't work in the "All" section.

img_downloads_dir_help_text.message: A path to the folder in the downloads folder, where downloaded images will go. May contain subfolders. Must not contain characters prohibited by the operating system. If the folder does not exist, it will be created on the first download. Leave empty to download images into the default folder. Example: !Google/Images

img_viewer_copy_img_btn_is_visible_help_.message: Not all apps will accept images copied with this button. In these cases you will need to copy images the usual way - via browser context menu.

jump_to_related_searches_title.message: Click to jump to related searches/pagination buttons. Click again or middle-click the scroll to top button to return to the previous position.

search_enhancer_for_google_chrome_link_t.message: ⚗️ Search Enhancer for Google™ for Chrome

search_enhancer_for_google_edge_link_tex.message: ⚗️ Search Enhancer for Google™ for Edge

load_end_msg_error_text.message: An error occured. Google thinks you're a robot. Reload the page and solve the captcha.‎

remember_scroll_position_hotkey.message: Remember scroll position/return to the remembered scroll position

remember_scroll_position_forced_hotkey.message: Remember scroll position (if Search Enhancer for Google™ already have a position remembered)
